Among the generation of talented directors who emerged in the Eighties  Regis Wargnier, has been possibly one of the showiest in years.

"La femme de ma vie" is a touching movie around the personal slowdown  process of self destruction of an alcoholic, who is well understood and better supported by his wife.

A mature film that should be seen due its admirable realism and realistic intensity.
